Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
^1=== CAP YOUR ELEMENTAL RESISTANCES === +1273 to elemental resistance
^2=== Brittle Boots === Minions have +2% to critical strike chance
^4=== Utility Spectres (not 100% uptime) === Remove " # " to show DPS with the buff/debuffs up #Nearby enemies take 15% increased damage #Minions deal 20% increased damage #Minions have 20% increased attack speed
^6=== Animate Guardian === Nearby allies have +10 Fortification You have Fortify Nearby allies have +50% to critical strike multiplier Nearby enemies are scorched 50% increased Effect of Scorch
